room_title: Escape room "The Half Treasure Map" by 8D Room Escape & Board Games in Boston
room_description: You find half of a treasure map with a curious symbol. Your investigation of the symbol tells you this belonged to the infamous pirate, Whitebeard, a wealthy, intelligent, and tactical pirate. This is what you have been dreaming of your entire life, wealth and a challenge. You and your crew set out to look for the treasureâ€¦
